definition: net for fishing or bird catching/(fig.) fetters/to snare (a valuable new team member etc)/to bring together under the one umbrella

sentences.english: Through many dangers, toils, and snares I have already come.
sentences.chinese: 許多危險，試練網羅，我已安然經過。

sentences.english: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me.
sentences.chinese: 驕傲人爲我暗設網羅和繩索。

sentences.english: He spread a net for my feet and turned me back.
sentences.chinese: 他鋪下網羅，絆我的腳，使我轉回。

sentences.english: How you find "Smart" People Who know the Technology and the Business?
sentences.chinese: 如何網羅既懂技術又懂商業的“聰明”人才？

sentences.english: They worshiped their idols, which became a snare to them.
sentences.chinese: 事奉他們的偶像，這就成了自己的網羅。

sentences.english: This will allow SMEseven more chance to target or network with specific customers.
sentences.chinese: 這也將使中小企業有更多的機會網羅更多的特殊用戶。

sentences.english: We want more information as much as we can.
sentences.chinese: 我們想盡可能地網羅更多的信息。

sentences.english: With infinite patience she prepared to snare me and bind me.
sentences.chinese: 她以無限的耐心準備把我網羅住，捆住我的手腳。

sentences.english: And oft escaped the tempter's snare by thy return, sweet hour of prayer.
sentences.chinese: 試探網羅得以脫離，我惟靠此禱告良辰。

sentences.english: It trembles as birch limbs webbing the air.
sentences.chinese: 它顫抖着，如樺樹枝在網羅空氣。

sentences.english: In some places, there are just too many companies scrabbling around for talent.
sentences.chinese: 在一些地方，有太多的企業四處網羅人才。

sentences.english: Know now that God hath overthrown me, and hath compassed me with his net.
sentences.chinese: 就該知道是神傾覆我，用網羅圍繞我。

sentences.english: The Imperial Examinations is a means for the ruler to gather talents.
sentences.chinese: 而科舉考試是統治者網羅人才的手段。

sentences.english: Whoever flatters his neighbor is spreading a net for his feet.
sentences.chinese: 諂媚鄰舍的，就是設網羅絆他的腳。

sentences.english: Terror and pit and snare await you, O people of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 地上的居民哪，恐懼，陷坑，網羅，都臨近你。

sentences.english: Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth, where no gin is for him?
sentences.chinese: 若沒有機檻，雀鳥豈能陷在網羅裏呢。

definition: to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to get together all at once
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
every trade/all professions/all walks of life
